translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に弓矢が舞い、怒号が乱れ飛ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrows flutter across the battlefield, and angry shouts fly wildly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三方から迫る魔軍の暴力、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The violent forces of the demon army press in from three sides,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに対抗する人類軍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the human army opposes them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこの登り口も戦いが激化していくが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fighting intensifies at every ascent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱音を吐く者は一人としていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but not a single person utters a word of weakness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もがここを最後の戦場と考え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone considers this their final battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死力を尽くしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they are giving everything they have.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとえに、魔人レッドアイの喉笛に食らいつく為。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All for the sole purpose of sinking their teeth into the demon Red Eye's throat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ランスは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Rance—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ばりばり、ばりばり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Crunch, crunch, crunch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーむ、中村屋のせんべぇは美味しいなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, Nakamuraya’s rice crackers really are delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自室でのんびり休憩をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was leisurely taking a break in his room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドに腰掛けたランスの足下には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Rance’s feet as he sat on the bed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 床に腰を下ろしたシィルが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel was seated on the floor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを心配そうに見上げていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: looking up at Rance with concern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くの壁に背を預けたサテラは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, leaning against a nearby wall,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先ほどから苦い顔を崩さない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hadn't changed her bitter expression since a while ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイが出るまでの間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until Red Eye appeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度も援軍として戦場と城を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others had repeatedly traveled back and forth between the battlefield and the castle as reinforcements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 往復し続けたランス達。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They kept going back and forth relentlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、果たしてレッドアイは現れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, sure enough, Red Eye appeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は決戦前の最後の休憩だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and now it was the last break before the final battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う……ランス様ぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「不景気な声を出すな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't make such gloomy noises.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかくの休憩中なのに気が滅入るだろが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's supposed to be a break, and that would bring everyone down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいたっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あう、すみません……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, sorry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せんべぇは美味いな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "These rice crackers sure are tasty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばりばり、ばりばり……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crunch, crunch..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ばりばり、ばりばり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Crunch, crunch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、美味い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mmm, delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、でも、ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-but, Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……今、とってもピンチです……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... we're in a terrible pinch right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイの勢いが止まらなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The momentum of the demon Red Eye just won't stop..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、このままじゃ本当に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If things go on like this, really..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばりばり……ばりばり……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Crunch crunch... crunch crunch..."
"Ah, um..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、美味い美味い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah—delicious, delicious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばりばり、ばりばり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crunch crunch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばりばりばりばりばりばりばりばり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばりばりばりばりばりばりばりばり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばりばりばりばりばりばりばりばり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様ぁ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふん、うるさい奴隷だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, noisy slave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ぱんぱん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, clap clap."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが二度、手を叩くと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance clapped his hands twice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつの間にか城に帰っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: before he knew it, they had returned to the castle.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばりばりばりばりばりばりばりばり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばりばりばりばりばりばりばりばり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばりばりばりばりばりばりばりばり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch crunch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様ぁ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふん、うるさい奴隷だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, noisy slave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ぱんぱん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, clap clap."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが二度、手を叩くと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance clapped his hands twice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつの間にか城に帰っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: before he knew it, they had returned to the castle.
